column1: <!-- Brighton & Hove City Council - Education Online skin -->
This page looks plain and unstyled because you're using a

non-standard compliant browser. Please upgrade to a browser that supports web standards as soon as possible. Staff within Brighton & Hove City Council can call the ICT Helpdesk on 292001. Staff within schools should contact their ICT Coordinator or ICT Support Staff. Everyone else can get useful information from The Web Standards Project's Browser Upgrade initiative.
Brighton & Hove Education Online Printable version
Welcome to our web pages for those wishing to gain QTS.

column2: developing these pages, so if you have any specific queries in the meantime, please contact the Schools' Training Team on (01273) 293466 or schools.training@brighton-hove.gov.uk
